commands.fpsm.help.listener.add_change_i:
Description: Creates a module that changes the shop item and cost when the slot is bought, and restores when returned.
Parameters:
default_cost - The cost of the default item (offhand item) in the shop slot.
changed_cost - The cost of the changed item (mainhand item) in the shop slot.
Requires: The player must hold the default item in the offhand and the changed item in the main hand.
commands.fpsm.help.map.create.hover:
Description: Creates a game map area without setting spawn points, defining only the game boundaries.
Parameters:
mapName - The unique name for the map being created.
gameType - The game mode type.
from - The first corner coordinate of the area (format: x y z or ~x ~y ~z).
to - The second corner coordinate of the area (format: x y z or ~x ~y ~z).
Requires: OP permission and a valid game type must be pre-registered in the system. Coordinates define a valid 3D area.
